keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The pardon by Joko Widodo was part of an effort to address human rights abuses in the country’s restive eastern region.

headline.print_headline: Indonesia Pardons 5 Political Inmates in Restive Area
headline.main: Indonesia President, Joko Widodo, Pardons Prisoners in Papua Province

snippet: The pardon by Joko Widodo was part of an effort to address human rights abuses in the country’s restive eastern region.
